source.name: byte_limit
source.label: Byte Limit
source.description: The maximum number of bytes to return. Use any of these suffixes; KB, MB, GB, or TB

source.name: rcp
source.label: Infer Schema
source.description: Obtain the schema from the data source

source.name: row_limit
source.label: Row Limit
source.description: The maximum number of rows to return

source.name: sampling_percentage
source.label: Sampling percentage
source.description: Percentage for each row or block to be included in the sample

source.name: sampling_seed
source.label: Sampling seed
source.description: Seed to be used for getting a repeatable sample

source.name: sampling_type
source.label: Sampling Type
source.description: Indicates which data sampling type should be used in the select statement

source.name: schema_name
source.label: Schema Name
source.description: The name of the schema that contains the table to read from

source.name: select_statement
source.label: Select Statement
source.description: The SQL SELECT statement for retrieving data from the table

source.name: table_name
source.label: Table Name
source.description: The name of the table to read from

target.name: create_statement
target.label: Create Statement
target.description: The Create DDL statement for recreating the target table

target.name: existing_table_action
target.label: Table Action
target.description: The action to take on the target table, if it already exists, to handle the existing and new data sets

target.name: key_column_names
target.label: Key Column Names
target.description: A comma separated list of column names to override the primary key used during an update or merge

target.name: schema_name
target.label: Schema Name
target.description: The name of the schema that contains the table to write to

target.name: table_action
target.label: Table Action
target.description: The action to take on the target table to handle the new data set

target.name: table_name
target.label: Table Name
target.description: The name of the table to write to

target.name: write_mode
target.label: Write Mode
target.description: The mode for writing records to the target table
